title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, June 10, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Saul Bellow (1915), who grew up in Chicago as an undocumented immigrant and who said, "in expressing love we belong among the undeveloped countries."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Saul Bellow (1915), who grew up in Chicago as an undocumented immigrant and who said, "in expressing love we belong among the undeveloped countries."
